abstract: “That reporter couldn’t have done too good a job on you yesterday, huh?” Mr. Trump said to Mr. Pompeo, with a half-smile on his face. “I think you did a good job on her, actually.”
lead_paragraph: Even as he portrayed himself as a firmly-in-control head of state announcing a peace plan for the Middle East, President Trump could not resist injecting a moment of political spite against a NPR journalist into the White House ceremony.
